pageTitle: Jack Brabham again the beneficiary as Jim Clark nets first podium | Formula 1 | Formula 1 news, live F1 | ESPN.co.uk

Jim Clark finished third, for his first podium finish, just behind Bruce McLaren, who was second in his Cooper Climax. Moss was once again plagued with mechanical problems, visiting the pits
